title: WTF IS THIS?!?!?! CLIENT PLEASE WHAT?!?!!?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
This Happened for EVERYONE apart from one person in the lobby.
Even when people leave it doesnt END the lobby at all

PLS RITO
WE LOVE YOU AND ALL BUT WHYYYY :P

replies.body: Oh wow that's strange. Makes it pretty hard to get into the actual match if the client won't let you select a champion. Sometimes that message can pop up if your client is having a hard time keeping a solid connection that the specific game server you were going to be playing on, so let's troubleshoot there first. Try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), test it in a custom or practice game, and let me know if it helps.
